description: Doug Acre"The Destroyer"Ht: 5'6" WT: 150lbs Season W/L record ( 4-0)Landon Conrad"The Law"Ht: 5'9" WT: 185lbsSeason W/L record (1-0) Many have fought with raging hard cocks in hopes of winning the gold belt at the end of our Summer Smackdown Tournament, but only our final four remain as we begin the semi-finals. In our first semi-final match, Doug "The Destroyer" Acre who previously defeated Alex "The Axe" Adams and "The Titan" Marcus Ruhl now has one more obstacle, Landon "The Law" Conrad. The Law has been waiting as our seeded fighter for this precise moment, he's not threatened by his opponents size and plans on having fun tossing him around the mat. The Destroyer is confident as always though, after defeating The Titan he knows this is one more stepping stone to being crowned champion. Both fighters will be making it to the live tag team finale, but only one will have the opportunity to win the belt in the end. Who will fight their way to victory and who will get fucked without mercy? Stay tuned!
title: Naked Kombat's Summer Smackdown Tournament - First Semi-Final Match
